title: Remove Play Store Guide section from KYL UI

requirements.text: Remove the "Play Store Guide" section from the app UI so users can no longer navigate to or view any Google Play Store publishing checklist content.
acceptanceCriteria: The sidebar/mobile navigation no longer shows an item labeled "Play Store Guide".
The Overview page no longer shows a "Play Store Guide" quick-link card.
The app no longer defines or navigates to a "play-store-guide" section id (no route/switch case that renders the Play Store guide).
The project builds successfully with no TypeScript errors after removing the section and its references.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the existing PWA install button and installability logic intact; only remove the Play Store Guide content/entry points.
nonGoals: Changing or removing the "Install App" button or PWA install flow.
